data.name: Sep's Diner (DEMO)
data.description:
THIS IS A DEMO VERSION OF SEP'S DINER. FULL GAME INCLUDES 54 LEVELS, MORE RECIPES AND CO-OP MULTIPLAYER!

Welcome to Sep's Diner, the new restaurant of which YOU are the Chef! Will it really become the best burger in town? It's up to you!
Level after level, your experience will increase as well as the number of your gourmet customers. They are in a hurry, so make it quick to satisfy them before they leave!
Impatient, they won't let you make a mistake... Be precise to make the best possible profit!

Including a brand new Dessert restaurant: Sep's Donut!

Game Features :
· 2 restaurants
· 3 game modes included: Timed, Relaxed, Multiplayer
· 27 levels included per restaurant
· Co-op multiplayer up to 4 players
· Intense and thrilling levels!
· Immersive audio ambiance
· Impatient customers with fun voices
· Beautiful scenery and colored lights
· More than 30 different combinations for burgers recipes!
· Pancakes, donuts, waffles, cupcakes, ice-creams and milkshakes in the Dessert café!
